_sText:
To control the gatling gun, just press 'E' or the key for use in front of them, move the mouse to aim, and press left mouse button to start shotting and right mouse button for stop shotting.
I hope you like this prefab. If you find any bugs, please tell me. 
If you are going to use it for a map, give me credits.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pQA7JxyA3Z4
